summary:
DEJAVU Coin promotes transparency and fairness in online gambling - DEJAVU Coin operates on the Binance blockchain Network

 DEJAVU Coin facilitates cross-border transactions - DEJAVU Coin's blockchain technology can be leveraged to implement responsible gaming features

 DEJAVU Coin (DJV) is a cryptocurrency - DEJAVU Coin strives to be the preferred cryptocurrency for online casinos
proposal:
Hello DEJAVU Coin enthusiasts! 🎩

Ever wondered what it would be like if you could create your own DEX or run a blockchain-based lottery using your favorite DJV tokens? Well, you don't need to wonder anymore! We at OnOutDemos have the perfect B2B tools that can help you do just that. 

And to add a cherry on top, these tools are as transparent and fair as your beloved DEJAVU Coin. We believe in the same principles of transparency and fairness that DJV upholds in the world of online gambling.

1️⃣ With our 🔄 DEX (UNI FACTORY), you can create your own DEX based on Uniswap V2. And guess what? You can even customize it with DJV colors and logo.

2️⃣ Feeling lucky? Try our 🎰 Lottery tool. It's a blockchain-based lottery where you can earn 0-30% commission. And of course, DJV tokens are fully supported.

We have a plethora of other tools like 🪙 Wallet, 🌾 Farming, 🗳 DAO, 🌉 CrossChain, and 🚀 IDOFactory - Launchpad that can help you leverage DJV's blockchain technology to its fullest potential.

And the best part? It's all B2B, so you're not just playing, you're creating! 

So, are you ready to put DJV on the map in a whole new way? Let us know! 👋

Check out our tools here 👉 https://t.me/onoutdemos

P.S. Remember, what happens in DEJAVU, doesn't stay in DEJAVU. 😉
